full_summary:
**Tender Announcement**
======================

**Title**: Field Site Operations Technician for East Trout Lake, Saskatchewan
**Solicitation Number**: 5000082716

**Date**: The tender is open from [2024-11-07] to [2024-12-06 14:00:00]

**Description**:

Environment and Climate Change Canada is seeking the services of a Field Site Operations Technician at East Trout Lake, Saskatchewan. The successful bidder will provide services as outlined in the Statement of Work, Annex A to the bid solicitation, from [2025-04-01] to [2028-03-31].

**Security Requirements**:

The successful bidder must comply with the security requirements as outlined in Part 6 - Security, Financial and Other Requirements, and Part 7 - Resulting Contract Clauses of the bid solicitation.

**Integrity Provisions**:

Bidders must provide a list of names and other relevant information as required, according to section 01 Integrity Provisions of Standard Instructions: 2003.

**Trade Agreements**:

The requirement is subject to the provisions of the Canada-Korea Free Trade Agreement.

**Social Procurement**:

Environment and Climate Change Canada encourages under-represented groups to participate in this opportunity. Bidders owned or led by Canadians from under-represented groups, such as women, LGBTQ2+ persons, persons with disabilities, and persons from visible minorities, are encouraged to submit a bid.

**Contact Information**:

For additional information, please contact Megan Filliol, Contracting Officer:

* Email: [megan.filliol@ec.gc.ca](mailto:megan.filliol@ec.gc.ca)
* Phone: (819) 307-2084
* Fax: None

**Attachments**:

The bid solicitation documents are available on the Canada Buys website: 
[https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51212/5000082716_field-site-ops-tech_rfp_en_final.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/sites/default/files/webform/tender_notice/51212/5000082716_field-site-ops-tech_rfp_en_final.pdf)

There has been no modifications. Share your version!  How was the result?
